content: http://community.fhir.org/t/medication-dispense-dosage-instruction-combination-therapy-representation/289 - @Michelle (Moseman) Miller @John Hatem @Melva Peters I'm not sure of the answer for that question

RxNorm uses "consists of" to express two components: Metformin hydrochloride 1000 MG and dapagliflozin 10 MG
http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/RXNORM?p=classes&conceptid=1593058

OK, @Grahame Grieve , I posted a reply within the FHIR Community Forum that elaborates on a couple use cases - specifically when a precoordinated code exists and also how we handle TPN orders that don't have an over-arching precoordinated product code
